scripts.generate:data: for d in public/data/*/; do python3 scripts/pokemon_to_json.py "$d/pokemon.txt" "$d/pokemon.json" --forms "$d/pokemon_forms.txt" --exclude-cosmetics && python3 scripts/abilities_to_json.py "$d/abilities.txt" "$d/abilities.json" && python3 scripts/types_to_json.py "$d/types.txt" "$d/types.json" && python3 scripts/moves_to_json.py "$d" "$d/moves.json" && python3 scripts/items_to_json.py "$d/items.txt" "$d/items.json" && python3 scripts/encounters_to_json.py "$d/encounters.txt" "$d/encounters.json"; done
